page.title: 17GAMES IN CARNOUSTIE AREA.
page.content:
Here are some of the games played by children in this area.
{ RED ROVER} This is a game played by any number of people. There are two teams, A and B, each team holding hands. Team A calls over someone from Team B, who tries to break through the hands of Team A. If he succeeds he is allowed to go back to his own team, but if he does not, he joins Team A. This continues, with each team taking it in turns to call, until all the players are in one team.
{ DRACULA }All the players sit on the garden wall of one of their houses, backs towards the house. One person hides in the garden and the rest go to look for him. When they get near him he jumps out and tries to catch them.
